Verbatim Response: I was prompted to evaluate Rev because I needed a tool this. As a solo practitioner at my law firm, efficiency and accuracy are paramount in my work. Before using Rev, I struggled with time-consuming transcription tasks that often led to errors and delays in my legal documentation. The need for a reliable transcription service became evident when I missed a critical deadline due to transcription errors. This experience pushed me to seek out a solution Rev that could streamline my workflow and ensure precision in my documentation.

Or is it if a transcript is five bucks, let's say it is more expensive for me to go and track it all than it is, just let that go. that's one thing to consider. Also, if it's a subscription, you can write it off on your taxes and you don't have to continually, it's just done. I think it should be an option. Why not just do both.
